@squirrel.vscode.ai.endpoint.markdownDescription: Remote AI endpoint base URL (e.g. `https://api.squirrel.dev`). Extension calls `<endpoint>/ai/assist`.

@squirrel.vscode.ai.apiKey.markdownDescription: Bearer token used for remote AI requests.

@squirrel.vscode.ai.model.markdownDescription: Model identifier sent to the remote AI endpoint.

@squirrel.vscode.ai.timeoutMs.markdownDescription: Remote AI request timeout in milliseconds.

@squirrel.vscode.ai.fallbackEnabled.markdownDescription: When enabled, AI commands fall back to deterministic local responses if remote AI is unavailable.

@squirrel.vscode.cloudSync.enable.markdownDescription: Enable cloud synchronization of projects and analytics snapshots.

@squirrel.vscode.cloudSync.token.markdownDescription: Access token used for cloud sync requests.

@squirrel.vscode.cloudSync.workspaceId.markdownDescription: Optional workspace identifier attached as `X-Workspace` header.

@squirrel.vscode.cloudSync.timeoutMs.markdownDescription: Cloud sync request timeout in milliseconds.

@squirrel.vscode.cloudSync.retries.markdownDescription: Number of retries for failed cloud sync requests.

@squirrel.vscode.ai.remoteEnabled.markdownDescription: Master switch for calling remote AI endpoints. Disable to force local fallback mode.

@squirrel.vscode.ai.remoteRolloutPercent.markdownDescription: Percent rollout for remote AI traffic per machine (0-100). Useful for gradual rollout and rollback.

@squirrel.vscode.ai.telemetryEnabled.markdownDescription: Emit local telemetry events to the Squirrel AI output channel for rollout monitoring.

@squirrel.vscode.cloudSync.dryRun.markdownDescription: When enabled, cloud sync validates configuration but skips network writes (rollout safety mode).

@squirrel.vscode.cloudSync.telemetryEnab.markdownDescription: Emit local telemetry events to the cloud sync output channel.

@squirrel.vscode.cloudSync.maxConsecutiv.markdownDescription: Enter cooldown after this many consecutive cloud sync failures.

@squirrel.vscode.cloudSync.cooldownMs.markdownDescription: Cooldown duration before next sync attempt after repeated failures.
